#antichinazi

A day is too long in a war. Wars like this war, however, usually gets pretty long.

Apart from making sure the harshest possible version of HKHRDA can be passed, we should also gain support regarding the use of global magnitsky act to sanction war criminals and protect hk act to impose arms embargo on hk.

Should anything goes wrong with District elections (e.g. widespread dq or other dirty tricks) we must announce the death of one country two systems and urge for cancellation of hk policy act.

Daily exposure against the aggressions and crimes of ccp on Twitter and Reddit must continue so that more and more people will understand how dire the situation is.
